attributes.action: Request the Government of Indonesia Immediately Release Mr Mathew Davies
attributes.additional_details:
On the 7th of August 2014 Mathew Davies from Caerphilly County, South Wales was detained by South Jakarta Immigration Service for alleged ‘immigration irregularities’. He has since been held indefinitely and without due process at Cipinang Penitentiary Institution, a high security prison in Jakarta, Indonesia.

We call upon The Rt Hon Philip Hammond MP, Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs to request the Government of Indonesia immediately release Mr Mathew Davies.
